com.i2group.apollo.externaldata

Class ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
    The exception raised when an error occurs in an external data service.
    Since:
    5.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException(String message)
      Constructs a new ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException that contains the specified message.
      ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException(String message, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a new ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException that contains the specified message and wraps an earlier exception.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException

        public ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException(String message)
        Constructs a new ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException that contains the specified message.
        Parameters:
        message - A String that contains the message for this exception.

      • ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException

        public ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException(String message,
                                          Throwable cause)
        Constructs a new ExternalDataSourceRuntimeException that contains the specified message and wraps an earlier exception.
        Parameters:
        message - A String that contains the message for this exception.
        cause - The earlier, Throwable exception that identifies the cause of the error, or null if the original cause is unknown.
